objects.description: At Facebook Developers World HACK, you’ll hear from Facebook engineers who will walk you through developing great apps that are social by design. World HACK gives you a chance to collaborate with your peers and speak one-on-one with Facebook engineers. Then, put your skills to work and spend the day hacking with us. We’ll be awarding prizes for apps with the best Facebook integrations!
objects.name: Facebook Developers World HACK
objects.venue: Campos Eliseos 252 Chapultepec, Polanco Hotel W

objects.description: We proposed Translathon event, an activitie to make the localization of Firefox and creation of Wikipedia articles, in this case in Yaqui. The main objective is form community committed to support the localization, looking for awareness in our society about the importance of language preservation and promotion of the use on an important issue of digital inclusion of indigenous communities. It calls on key dates such as February 21, the International Day of Indigenous languages.
objects.name: Translathon in Yaqui (Feb 21th)
objects.venue: Centro de Cultura Yaqui "Capitán Manuel León Molina"

objects.description:
The Firefox team futboll Tocho-American Joint undertake activities with youth. There will be a teaching clinic futboll Tocho American children and teenagers interested in the sport. And it will give a talk about Mozilla and Firefox.

The team was formed Tocho Firefox for 6 months and committed to the sport and free software, intended to teach athletes the importance of an open web, open to innovative, where everyone has access to information flowing freely on the Internet.

objects.description:

The idea is to begin creating community about Firefox OS and eventually reach some app developers interested in the OS in Guanajuato.

Guanajuato is well known for its high-percent-of-students population.
Long story short: 
wait for it (500 characters limit)===

objects.description:
I'm going to have a workshop/hackathon with a gruop of Informatics, Engineering, Computer Science, and Mathematics students.

The idea is to get them to build their first app for Firefox OS. It may be something basic (like a game) or something complex, depending on their skills.
objects.name: Firefox OS in Guanajuato: Building your fisrt app (1st edition)

objects.description: The FLISOL (Festival Latin American Free Software Installation) is the event of dissemination of Free Software in Latin America's largest.
